Piers Morgan asked Oprah Winfrey what advice she would give Michael Vick . I really don't want to talk about Michael Vick because I'm trying to interview him, Oprah Winfrey said.`` I will just save all my advice for when I sit down with him.''`` I'm trying to get him as well. Colin Powell thinks that America`` isn't quite post-racial'' at this time.`` These problems still exist in post-racial America.'' However, he suggested that Henry Louis Gates should not have argued with the policeman arresting him. You don't argue with a police officer, he says.
